sentences.en: ...the threats our ancestors faced from wild beasts.
sentences.cn: …我们祖辈所面临的来自野兽的威胁。

sentences.en: Greed brought out the beast in her.
He was a tenacious beast . On the very ladder he lingered.
sentences.cn: 他这死不甘心的家伙, 在舷梯上踌躇不前了.

sentences.en: I am still a beast at bay.
sentences.cn: 我还是走投无路的困兽.

sentences.en: I hate him . He's a drawling, sneering beast.
sentences.cn: 我看见他就讨厌, 这混蛋说话慢腾腾的, 老是挖苦人.

sentences.en: I saw the beast and the kings of the earth.
sentences.cn: 我看见那兽和地上的君王.

sentences.en: I'll go and harness the beast.
It was a beast of a day , bleak, cold, and rainy.
sentences.cn: 冷风凄雨, 天气恶劣.

sentences.en: King Arthur himself captures the beast and cuts off its head.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟王亲自捉住怪物，并砍下它的头。

sentences.en: The beast in him came up.
The earth brings forth large crops every year for the sustenance of man and beast.
sentences.cn: 大地每年生产出大量的农作物,供人畜食用.

sentences.en: The unicorn is an imaginary beast.
sentences.cn: 独角兽是幻想出来的动物.

sentences.en: They used him like a beast of burden.
sentences.cn: 他们把他当牛马一样看待.

sentences.en: When he's drunk, he's a beast.

words.tran_cn: 野兽；畜生，人面兽心的人
